method: Place a sheet of nori on a sushi mat.
Spread sushi rice evenly over the nori.
Sprinkle sesame seeds over the rice.
Place salmon, tuna, and avocado slices on top of the rice.
Roll the sushi tightly using the sushi mat.
Repeat the process to make three more rolls.
Slice each roll into smaller pieces to resemble a camera roll.
Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.
Enjoy the delightful Camera Roll Sushi!
